item.description:
Ready for some fun and action? let's go Laser Tag. Here is a chance to for you to play like a kid and feel young. It's a great way to mingle and meet new friends. There is no age limited for this activity. It would be great if we can get 30 people so we can play with our own group of people. All new or old members of Asian Pro Meetup are welcome.

For more information about the directions or Laser Tag please go to http://www.lazerzone....

Cost - 2 games = $11 per person
4 games = $18 per person

How many games we play depends on how many sign up. If we have more than 20, we will most likely play 4 games. Afterward, we will go to local restaurant for dinner...may be Bertucci's. I need to make reservation at least a week advance, please RSVP soon if you can make it.

If anyone needs a ride or can give someone a ride please make a note in your RSVP. thanks


Susan

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Laser Tag
